name: UIAdaptivePresentationControllerDelegate
desc: A set of methods that, in conjunction with a presentation controller, determine how to respond to trait changes in your app.

items.name: func adaptivePresentationStyle(for: UIPresentationController, traitCollection: UITraitCollection) -> UIModalPresentationStyle
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the presentation style to use when the specified set of traits are active.

items.name: func adaptivePresentationStyle(for: UIPresentationController) -> UIModalPresentationStyle
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the new presentation style to use.

items.name: func presentationController(UIPresentationController, viewControllerForAdaptivePresentationStyle: UIModalPresentationStyle) -> UIViewController?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the view controller to display when adapting to the specified presentation style.

items.name: func presentationController(UIPresentationController, willPresentWithAdaptiveStyle: UIModalPresentationStyle, transitionCoordinator: UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinator?)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that an adaptivity-related transition is about to occur.

items.name: func presentationControllerDidAttemptToDismiss(UIPresentationController)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that a user-initiated attempt to dismiss a view was prevented.

items.name: func presentationControllerShouldDismiss(UIPresentationController) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate for permission to dismiss the presentation.

items.name: func presentationControllerDidDismiss(UIPresentationController)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate after a presentation is dismissed.

items.name: func presentationControllerWillDismiss(UIPresentationController)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate before a presentation is dismissed.

items.name: func presentationController(UIPresentationController, prepare: UIPresentationController)
items.desc: Provides an opportunity to configure the adaptive presentation controller after an adaptivity change.
